about_the_game:
Taken to a world that isn't his own, expected to face the dangers of The Void Sea alone, Brian Kendo is not willing to lie down and let this be his downfall. However, what he's unsure of is why. The mystery behind Brian Kendo, his true purpose, and his secret unknown ties to The Void Sea. It will take more than just one man to solve this mystery as Brian finds strange, unlikely allies in even stranger places. With the right people joining his cause, Brian Kendo jumps feet first into uncovering this bizarre mystery and hopes to find a way back home.

Explore the depths of what the "Celestials" call "The Void Sea", remnants of a bygone age, fight against strange creatures, meet even stranger people (some that may try to kill you), and of course; solve the mystery behind Brian Kendo's purpose in this Sci-Fi Fantasy RPG title made in the RPG Maker VX Ace engine.

name: VOIDWATCH: CrossLust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

short_description: The year is 1989, Brian Kendo is woken up by a loud and quite mysterious knocking sound against a metallic door. However there's one problem, this isn't Brian's home; in fact, Brian isn't sure where he is.
